actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate a segment of the Delaware River flowing between the State of New York and the State of Pennsylvania as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates a segment of the Delaware River flowing between Hancock New York, and Sparrow Bush, New York, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to designate a segment of the Delaware River flowing between the State of New York and the State of Pennsylvania as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
